title: Realised while praying had Vaseline, cream on face when made wudu, is wudu & prayer valid? Assim
transcript: from bangladesh he applied um some vaseline-like or jelly on his face then performed voodoo when he washed his face and rubbed his face he could not see any traces of it but after salat when he started doing this there was this creamy feeling so is his wudu and salad varied answer yes it is valid
